title: Thin.... but not dumb! - ASUS Zenbook S 13 OLED
description: Thanks to ASUS for sponsoring today's video! Buy your ASUS Zenbook S 13 today using the links below: ASUS:  US Amazon:  US Best Buy:  US Newegg:  CA Amazon:  CA Best Buy:  CA Canada Computers:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    GET MERCH:   LTX 2023 TICKETS AVAILABLE NOW:   GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE:   SPONSORS, AFFILIATES, AND PARTNERS:   PRODUCTS WE USE ON THE SHORTCIRCUIT SET:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Unboxing but without the box 0:48 Plasma? 1:36 I/O 4:10 Keyboard 6:09 CPU + Display 8:19 Speakers 9:54 Gaming 11:46 Webcam + Mic Quality 14:45 Teardown
